This dependency is used by Swagger, but regardless, the vulnerability is specific to Drupal, which we are not using. file name: mapstruct-1.1.0.Final.jar

This is used by iText for PDF generation, and I can't update to the newest version, as we use Flying Saucer to convert HTML to PDF, and that library requires this specific version of iText. Regardless, there are no private keys being used or exposed in any way during this process that could be exposed to attack as described in the vulnerability report. We are not creating encrypted or protected PDF files that would be exercising this code. file name: bcmail-jdk14-138.jar

This is actually the exact same vulnerability defined directly above, just through a related library.
This is used by iText for PDF generation, and I can't update to the newest version, as we use Flying Saucer to convert HTML to PDF, and that library requires this specific version of iText. Regardless, there are no private keys being used or exposed in any way during this process that could be exposed to attack as described in the vulnerability report. We are not creating encrypted or protected PDF files that would be exercising this code. file name: bcprov-jdk14-138.jar
